subject: Career
title: Hybrid Work: Finding the Right Balance
description: Learn Hybrid Work: Finding the Right Balance in one minute.

hook.text: Three days in office, two remote? Two and three? Companies are guessing. Nobody has the formula yet.

buildup.text: Hybrid work promises the best of both worlds: focus time at home and collaboration time in the office.

discovery.text: Nick Bloom's research: the ideal hybrid split is 2-3 days in office, focused on collaborative activities.

twist.text: Hybrid fails when office days become Zoom-call days. The office must offer what home cannot.

climax.text: Make office days intentional: team meetings, brainstorms, social events. Save deep work for home days.

punchline.text: Hybrid isn't about splitting days. It's about matching the work to the place.

quiz.question: What is the ideal hybrid split according to Nick Bloom's research?
options: 2-3 days in office focused on collaborative work
